title: John Vervaeke Live Q&A - 2022-02-06
description:
This is a patron-only Q&A, which happens monthly. You can sign up at any level to receive access here: https://www.patreon.com/johnvervaeke 

Thank you for joining my Q&A. A few notes: 

1. It starts just after 3 PM / 1500 EST and lasts for approximately an hour. 

2. The first ~45 minutes are previously submitted questions and the last ~15 minutes are questions from the live discussion chat. 

3. Please be respectful in your interactions with each other and with me, so we can focus on solutions to the Meaning Crisis. 

You can join the discord community to chat with others who are exploring and extending my work here: https://discord.gg/MXxRcmv
